kpi_info.title: MINIMUM PTXTARGETPS
kpi_info.use: The minimum target threshold PtxTargetPS value during the measurement period. The PtxTargetPS value is adjusted dynamically based on the measurement reports received from the BTS. UPDATED:When an RNC internal scheduling timer expires and there is at least one MAC-d flow allocated in the cell and HSDPA Dynamic Resource Allocation is enabled.
